de.schlegel11.jfxanimation

Interface JFXTemplateAction<N>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JFXTemplateProcess<N>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JFXTemplateConfig<N>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JFXAnimationTemplate

    public interface JFXTemplateAction<N>
extends JFXTemplateProcess<N>
    Class which provides methods for an animation action.
    This action is comparable to a KeyValue and represents a CSS like modify block (for a specific part) in keyframe animations.
    Since:
    2018-10-04
    Author:
    Marcel Schlegel (schlegel11)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JFXTemplateConfig<N> action(Function<JFXAnimationTemplateAction.InitBuilder<N>,JFXAnimationTemplateAction.Builder<?,?>> valueBuilderFunction)
      The action method is similar like a KeyValue.
      JFXTemplateConfig<N> action(JFXAnimationTemplateAction.Builder<?,?> animationValueBuilder)
      Same as the action(Function) method but without the lazy behaviour and doesn't provide a JFXAnimationTemplateAction.builder() instance.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.schlegel11.jfxanimation.JFXTemplateProcess

        from, percent, time, to

    • Method Detail

      • action

        JFXTemplateConfig<N> action(Function<JFXAnimationTemplateAction.InitBuilder<N>,JFXAnimationTemplateAction.Builder<?,?>> valueBuilderFunction)
        The action method is similar like a KeyValue.
        The method provides via a Function an action builder JFXAnimationTemplateAction.builder() which holds all the specific methods.
        Example: 
        
 .action(b -> b.target(Node::opacityProperty).endValue(0))
        Parameters:
        valueBuilderFunction - a Function which provides and accepts an JFXAnimationTemplateAction builder.
        Returns:
        a JFXTemplateConfig instance.

      • action

        JFXTemplateConfig<N> action(JFXAnimationTemplateAction.Builder<?,?> animationValueBuilder)
        Same as the action(Function) method but without the lazy behaviour and doesn't provide a JFXAnimationTemplateAction.builder() instance.
        Parameters:
        animationValueBuilder - the JFXAnimationTemplateAction.builder() instance.
        Returns:
        a JFXTemplateConfig instance.
        See Also:
        action(Function)
